name: Commander McSquidy
description:
This is the sixth Trijam for Team Twosticks!  The theme for Trijam #124 is “Dead Last.”

Our thanks to the open source community for making these projects possible by providing such amazing tools for free!

C. Haine (12) Senior Vice President of Engineering.  He originated the concept and did all the coding using Scratch 3.  “I wanted to experiment more with recording actions”

K. Haine (12) leads the Visual Design department.  She designed all artwork and characters in Krita. “I was inspired by nanikisunami’s four color palette of Big Sip Escape”

P. Haine (>12) runs the Audio department.  The music was composed in Logic Pro X and sound effects were edited using Audacity.  “I learned how to make watery sound effects using online tutorials.  (Hint: Phaser + reverb + low-pass filter.)”

Most sound effects originated from Freesound.org.  Some came from Logic Pro X.
